properties.name: clerk.jwks-uri
properties.description: JWKS endpoint used to validate Clerk JWT tokens.

properties.name: clerk.issuer
properties.description: Expected JWT issuer for Clerk tokens.

properties.name: openrouter.api-key
properties.description: API key used to authenticate requests to OpenRouter.

properties.name: openrouter.default-model
properties.description: Default model for free tier LLM calls.

properties.name: openrouter.pro-model
properties.description: Model for pro tier LLM calls.

properties.name: r2.public-url
properties.description: Public CDN URL for Cloudflare R2 bucket.

properties.name: telegram.bot-token
properties.description: Telegram bot token used for notifications.

properties.name: jobflow.mail.from
properties.description: Default From address for outbound JobFlow emails.
